file_content.text: My fleet's safe from Organa's eyes. Our next attack will devastate them.
The spies are dead. Here's their intel.
You see, officer? This is how you get results on Alderaan!
Few can be as impressive as me.
I'm a hard act to live up to.
True. Few live up to our standards.
I like your energy.
A Thul victory always gets my blood pounding.
Farewell, then.
Your deed demands tribute. Perhaps I'll name a battleship after you.
But first, there's Alderaan to conquer. If you'll excuse me, I have a fleet to command.
My fleet will be in striking distance soon. Please hurry!
That's impossible! Our fleet must crush their resistance, not bow to it!
Ah, we have visitors. Moff Sarek spoke highly of your accomplishments. You're just the talent I require.
Ah, a visitor. Moff Sarek's made your deeds well known. Perhaps you could assist me.
Sorry, don't mind the chaos. Used to fighting at sea, not being stuck on land. I hope you all came to join our fight.
Please excuse the confusion. Land ops aren't my forte. Maybe you could help in that regard.
I'm Bevek Thul, commander of Thul aquatic forces. We're locked in a stalemate with Organa and Ulgo. We can't break their defenses!
What sparked this standoff?
How did this start?
Shouldn't you concentrate your attacks on one foe?
Why fight two enemies at once?
One massive strike would seriously impair both sides. Unfortunately Organa's predicting our movements. They're spying on us!
This just isn't your day.
Yes, well, our navy's endured worse.
We were employing coastal attacks. Victory was assured, but Organa's predicted our every move. They're spying on us!
I dispatched my best men to weed out Organa's agents, but they've been killed--throats slashed to silence their screams.
My fleet's massing for another strike. We must obliterate Organa's spies, recover any information recorded, before they deflect us again!
I'll gut the spies, spill their secrets onto their boots.
They'll die badly.
Just what they deserve.
I'll torture the spies, make them squeal.
Their deaths will reveal much.
They won't spill a word, my lord. That's what their recordings are for.
I'll handle these spies. I know their tactics.
I'm well-suited for this task.
Very good, sir. Glad to have you on board.
I'll kill every spy on Alderaan if the pay's right.
Anything for credits.
The Thul Navy doesn't expect charity. You'll be compensated.
I might be able to help.
Every second you hesitate is one more our enemies live. I'm sure you'll make the right choice.
The spies can't be far. Find them, get their recordings. Then Organa will know the might of our aquatic forces!
I won't do it. [Refuse quest]
Very well. My bombardments won't stop until our enemies perish or my fleet's sunk!
Thul aquatic forces never sleep. We'll crush our enemies soon enough.
